'''Stunning Revenge''' is [[Beidou]]'s [[Level 4 Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Although the constellation description specifies Beidou's [[Oceanborne|Normal Attacks]], its effect applies to her Charged Attacks as well.
* The DMG dealt by this constellation is 20% of Beidou's [[ATK]].<!--not worded clearly in description-->
* This constellation can be triggered by damageless hits from teammates, such as [[Dori]]'s [[Alcazarzaray's Exactitude|Electro application]], [[Kujou Sara]]'s [[Tengu Stormcall|buff application]], and Aura Checks from [[Anemo]] characters capable of [[Elemental Absorption]].
